text: thumb Moises Liebana (1930-2011) was a noted player of the gaita cabreiresa bagpipe of León Province, Spain, known for reviving such works as the Danza del rey Nabucodonosor. In 2011, the Ayuntamiento de Truchas dedicated a plaza in Corporales to his memory. ==References== Category:Bagpipe players Category:Spanish musicians Category:Riojan people Category:1930 births Category:2011 deaths
title: Moises Liebana
